bill_title: establish certain wage requirements for the recipients of REDI fund loans.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain wage requirements for the recipients of REDI fund loans. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-16G be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No person may receive a loan from the revolving economic development and initiative fund unless the person agrees, as a condition to receiving the loan, to pay to nonmanagement employees a wage which averages at least one hundred ten percent of the average hourly wage for that occupational title and employment region as compiled by the occupational employment statistics program of the Department of Labor. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
